archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ADV010 Exploit poorly designed network architecture
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The threat takes advantage of poorly designed network architecture to identify potential target systems for further threat events.
Assessment guidance: This threat event can include exploiting: ԉ unnecessary or unprotected internet connections ԉ weak filtering on internet or internal network connections ԉ a lack of segregation of critical systems or business functions (e.g. no DMZ in place).
